articles.author: Caroline Valetkevitch
articles.title: Nasdaq manages 5th straight record high close; S&P 500 ends barely lower - Reuters
articles.description: The Nasdaq eked out a fifth straight record closing high on Friday following gains in Adobe and other technology-related shares, while the S&P 500 and Dow ended slightly lower.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Microsoft to delay release of Recall AI feature on security concerns - Reuters
articles.description: Microsoft will not roll out "Recall", an AI-powered feature that tracks computer usage, with its new computers next week and will instead preview it with a smaller group later, the tech giant said on Thursday, amid concerns of privacy risks.

articles.title: Top Gainers and Losers today on 14 June, 2024: Eicher Motors, Mahindra & Mahindra, Tech Mahindra, Tata Consultancy Services among most active stocks; Check full list here | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: Top Gainers and Losers Today : The Sensex gained 181.87 points, or 0.24, to settle at 76810.9, while the Nifty gained 66.7 points, or 0.29, to close at 23398.9.
articles.content: Top Gainers and Losers Today : The Nifty closed at 23398.9, up by 0.29%. Throughout the day, the Nifty reached a high of 23490.4 and a low of 23334.25. The Sensex traded between 77081.3 and 76549.05,… [+3764 chars]

articles.title: WhatsApp Announces Improved Video Calling Features for Mobile and Desktop Apps | Technology News - Gadgets 360
articles.description: WhatsApp announced several new features related to video calling for mobile and desktop users on Thursday. The participant list for group video calls has been expanded and up to 32 members can now be on a call together across all devices. Furthermore, users c…
